Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering      Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering   Main Menu    Undergraduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Accreditation    Courses    ME Major    IE Major    EM Major    Minors    Internships and Jobs    Student Groups    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Graduate           Admissions    Courses    International Programs    Master’s Programs    PhD Programs    PhD Dissertations    Post-Graduation Outcomes    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Research           Research Areas    Labs         Faculty and Staff           Department Head    Core Faculty    Affiliate Faculty    Emeritus Faculty    Staff    Open Positions         News           Department Seminars    News         About           Mechanical Engineering    Industrial Engineering    Energy Engineering    Advisory Board    Contact    Head's Message          Eyebrow menu    Giving    Alumni    College of Engineering Home    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering    About the Department    Advisory Board        Advisory Board  UIC Mechanical and Industrial Engineering's Industrial Advisory Board serves as a bridge between the department and industry. Established in 2001, the board is composed of outstanding professionals who represent a broad range of industrial firms.  Professor Sabri Cetin , the board’s faculty coordinator, works with Department Head Farzad Mashayek to facilitate the board’s role in shaping the way in which UIC educates future mechanical and industrial engineers. In general, board members offer insight from industry that enhances the undergraduate program, and they provide points of connection between students and faculty and the professional engineering community.       photo block             Industry Members    Said Al-Hallaj, PhD , Co-Founder and Chairman/CEO, AllCell Technologies  Peyman Davoudabadi, PhD , Principal Engineer, ANSYS  Christina Martini , Partner, McDermott, Will, & Emery  Brad Mueller , Executive Vice President, Briggs Corporation  Majid Naghshineh, PhD , Director of Engineering, Hubbell Lighting Components  Melinda A. Riddick , MWL Engineering Manager, Caterpillar Inc.  Rudi Schick , Chief Science Officer, Spraying Systems Co.
